publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: before; in the past year(s)
of Qi; belonging to Qi; coming from Qi
the common people of Npl
desire (objects) 甚欲; hanker after
gold =黃金
As for the topic, there is N[SUBJ](A) 有 B: There is/exists a certain B (at/among A) 宋人有拔苗者
early morning; early in the morning
read pī: wear (cloth); bear (shield etc); abstractly, occasionally: bear (a bad name etc)
(primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)
official hat used to indicate one's social position
go to (so as to stay there for a considerable time, or for some business); move towards; of things: be moved to
market; also more generally: the marketplace (with gates??); market settlements
go to and get to a certain place; be on one's way to a certain place, head for
try to sell, offer for sale; trade in
golden [objects]
the place as specified by N
ZZ 995: (of monkey) pick up things or hang onto things with one's feet; LAO 55: prone to pick up prey with one's legs (as birds); HANSHU: pick up and capture with one's feet (as a bird)
try to escape; try to leave the scene
minor law enforcement officer; police officer; magistrate
arrest somebody
to ask (followed by direct speech)
people; the people 君者舟也；人者水也。"The ruler is (like) a boat; the (his) people are (like) water"
everyone; anyone; all of them (quantifies then) (The manifest verbal derivation is from "be together", hence this is not construed as an nadV.)
literally: be in the place N
there
polite: you
other people's
why is it the case that S?; why is it so?, what is the reason of it?......,何也?
answer politely
pick up, take up; go and get (what one owns), fetch
in the time of S1
perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)
only; just; merely (negated as 非徒 rarely 不徒)

tls:text.tls:line: manners and laws to support them;

sense.def: ritual-based legal system

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu's younger brother Bu

sense.def: Standard Name: Mèng Sūn Yáng 孟孫陽 Also known as: Yáng Zhū 楊朱 Unger no. 496

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu's younger brother Bu

sense.def: brother of N

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Zhu's younger brother Bu

sense.def: be called
N2=kin: 文王之母 "King Wen's mother" NP2 designates a kinship relation which NP1 has to NP2

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: wear as one's clothes, use for clothing; dress up in (someone's clothes)

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: pale white; pristine off-white, unadorned plain white; clad in unadorned plain white

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: (primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)

tls:text.tls:line: went out wearing a white silk coat.

sense.def: depart, leave the place where one happens to be (to leave the room, leave the house; leave the capital); come out; set out on an expedition
拜而受之 "bow and accept it" V2-ing to V1
from the sky
it was raining

tls:text.tls:line: and he took off the white coat

sense.def: take off (clothes); cease to wear

tls:text.tls:line: and came back wearing a black one.

sense.def: black

tls:text.tls:line: and came back wearing a black one.

sense.def: return home

tls:text.tls:line: His dog did not recognise him,

sense.def: his own

tls:text.tls:line: His dog did not recognise him,

sense.def: originally: puppy, also the young of bears and tigers; mostely generally: dog

tls:text.tls:line: His dog did not recognise him,

sense.def: recognise the identity of the contextually determinate person

tls:text.tls:line: and barked when it came out to welcome him.

sense.def: go out to meet (in a hostile or friendly way); specifically: to welcome, come out to welcome (also seasons like spring)

tls:text.tls:line: and barked when it came out to welcome him.

sense.def: bark at
之市而忘操之 "when he went to the market he forgot to take it along": and/but on that occasion; (when S) at that particular time

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Bu, angry, was about to beat the dog.

sense.def: become angry

tls:text.tls:line: Yang Bu, angry, was about to beat the dog.

sense.def: will V; is willing to V; have the intention to

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: you (my daughter etc)

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: don't verb any object 無言; don't Vt at any time "don't speak!"; so as not to

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: strike the contextually determinate object

tls:text.tls:line: 'Don't beat it.

sense.def: marker of (probably mild) imperative sentences

tls:text.tls:line: You are no different yourself.

sense.def: likewise, also (sometimes with omitted antecedent, as in 盜亦有道乎？)

tls:text.tls:line: You are no different yourself.

sense.def: copula-like verb: be like; be no better than

tls:text.tls:line: You are no different yourself.

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

seg.line: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: supposing as a purely hypothetical and theoretical, or at least remote, possibility

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: your

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: be white; of swords: blank, i.e. drawn; derived nominal usage; of hair: be grey

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: go one's way; go away, leave; get out; go out; set out for campaigns

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: be black

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往，黑而來，
tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that just now your dog had gone out white and come back black,

sense.def: come to a contextually determinate place (i.e. the place where the speaker currently is)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往黑而來

sense.def: recently; HDC: 剛才

tls:text.tls:srcline: 嚮者使汝狗白而往黑而來

sense.def: 拜而受之 "bow and accept it" V2-ing to V1

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: introducing rhetorical questions

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: be (temporarily) able to

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: be surprised because of the contextually determinate situation

tls:text.tls:line: wouldn't you have been surprised?'

sense.def: (in questions) rhetorical (marked explicitly as rhetorical by such particles as 豈)
negation after pivotal or, occasionally, modal verbs

tls:text.tls:line: and when the retainers could think of no more tricks

sense.def: definite: the retainers

tls:text.tls:line: It is not only the sage, only the highest man,

sense.def: (presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: there were Primal Beginnings

sense.def: the great beginning

tls:text.tls:line: The Primal Beginnings

sense.def: the great beginning
codified law text written on bamboo
codified law text written on bamboo

tls:text.tls:line: to get the benefit you seek?

sense.def: be unrealistic

tls:text.tls:line: and if you know the reason, nothing will startle you.

sense.def: e.g. 其所由然 "that through which it is so": object pronoun

tls:text.tls:line: and if you know the reason, nothing will startle you.

sense.def: direct object: e.g. 所樂 "what (the understood/contextually determinate subject) enjoys": that which (the understood subject) Vt-s； the object Vt-ed by the the understood subject

tls:text.tls:line: My shallow craft can do nothing to cure it.'

sense.def: direct object: e.g. 所樂 "what (the understood/contextually determinate subject) enjoys": that which (the understood subject) Vt-s； the object Vt-ed by the the understood subject

tls:text.tls:line: and Bao Shuya was content to be under him.

sense.def: personally; face-to-face

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Wen of Jin set out to meet his allies,

sense.def: STANDARD NAME: Duke Wén of Jìn (reigned 636 - 628)ALTERNATIVE NAMES: Chóngěr 重耳PARENTS: Son of > Jìn Xiàn gōng 晉獻公 and Hú Jī 狐姬 WIVES: Married to the daughters of > Qí Huán gōng, > Qín Mù gōng 秦穆公 CHILDREN: Father of > Jìn Xiāng gōng 晉襄公

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Wen of Jin set out to meet his allies,

sense.def: to go out in order to V

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Wen of Jin set out to meet his allies,

sense.def: attend the contextually determinate meeting

tls:text.tls:line: intending to attack Wei.

sense.def: aim and desire to

tls:text.tls:line: intending to attack Wei.

sense.def: OBI: lauch an overt large-scale destructive military campaign against what is construed as an enemy of inferior political status

tls:text.tls:line: intending to attack Wei.

sense.def: name of a state

tls:text.tls:line: Gongzi Chu looked up at the sky smiling.

sense.def: prince Npr

tls:text.tls:line: Gongzi Chu looked up at the sky smiling.

sense.def: produce an audible sneer

tls:text.tls:line: The Duke asked why he smiled.

sense.def: ask the contextually determinate interlocutor N the question S

tls:text.tls:line: The Duke asked why he smiled.

sense.def: why? (unknown answer invited)

tls:text.tls:line: I am smiling at a neighbor of mine, who was escorting his wife

sense.def: laugh because of the situation described by S

tls:text.tls:line: I am smiling at a neighbor of mine, who was escorting his wife

sense.def: neighbouring (person) 鄰童

tls:text.tls:line: I am smiling at a neighbor of mine, who was escorting his wife

sense.def: people; the people 君者舟也；人者水也。"The ruler is (like) a boat; the (his) people are (like) water"

tls:text.tls:line: I am smiling at a neighbor of mine, who was escorting his wife

sense.def: accompany N to V

tls:text.tls:line: I am smiling at a neighbor of mine, who was escorting his wife

sense.def: main wife of N

tls:text.tls:line: on a visit to her family.

sense.def: go to and get to a certain place; be on one's way to a certain place, head for

tls:text.tls:line: on a visit to her family.

sense.def: private families, private clans (other than the ruler's); family of wife's parents

tls:text.tls:line: He saw a woman at the roadside working on the mulberries,

sense.def: on the way, underway, mid-way

tls:text.tls:line: He saw a woman at the roadside working on the mulberries,

sense.def: perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)

tls:text.tls:line: He saw a woman at the roadside working on the mulberries,

sense.def: working on the mulberry trees

tls:text.tls:line: He saw a woman at the roadside working on the mulberries,

sense.def: female of marriagable age; 宮婦,室婦

tls:text.tls:line: found her attractive and spoke to her.

sense.def: be pleased with a contextually determinate object

tls:text.tls:line: found her attractive and spoke to her.

sense.def: with (subject omitted immediately in front of yǔ 與)

tls:text.tls:line: found her attractive and spoke to her.

sense.def: referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it

tls:text.tls:line: found her attractive and spoke to her.

sense.def: enter into discussions with (someone)

tls:text.tls:line: But when he looked round at his wife,

sense.def: this being so> however; but

tls:text.tls:line: But when he looked round at his wife,

sense.def: turn one's head and look at N

tls:text.tls:line: there was another man beckoning to her.

sense.def: likewise, also (sometimes with omitted antecedent, as in 盜亦有道乎？)

tls:text.tls:line: there was another man beckoning to her.

sense.def: wave to somebody

tls:text.tls:line: I take the liberty of smiling at this.

sense.def: in polite speech: take the liberty of V-ing; humbly permit oneself to, humbly allow oneself to (NB 竊不敢...)

tls:text.tls:line: I take the liberty of smiling at this.

sense.def: the facts/situation just described

tls:text.tls:line: The Duke saw the point

sense.def: come to understand N (words etc.)

tls:text.tls:line: and halted.

sense.def: message/pronouncement of N

tls:text.tls:line: and halted.

sense.def: and thereupon, and then accordingly; then without delay;Then accordingly (often after a direct speech)

tls:text.tls:line: and halted.

sense.def: desist, not go or get through with a planned action; stop one's habitual action

tls:text.tls:line: He returned with his army,

sense.def: lead, command (an army, into attack or occasionally retreat); occasionally: lead along, show the way [guide][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: He returned with his army,

sense.def: the army of the contextually determinate N; army; OBI: military camp, encampment. Troops, armed force, division of the armed forces, regular armed forces; (obsolescent after Qin) HF 1.2: (several hundred thousand) organised armed personnel (should probably be npost-N)

tls:text.tls:line: He returned with his army,

sense.def: turn round; be on one's way back; having turned back (and being thus on one's way back)

seg.line: 未至，而有伐其北鄙者矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 未至，而有伐其北鄙者矣。
tls:text.tls:line: but before he arrived another state had attacked his North borders.

sense.def: not yet

tls:text.tls:srcline: 未至，而有伐其北鄙者矣。
tls:text.tls:line: but before he arrived another state had attacked his North borders.

sense.def: arrive at the contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 未至，而有伐其北鄙者矣。
tls:text.tls:line: but before he arrived another state had attacked his North borders.

sense.def: northern

tls:text.tls:srcline: 未至，而有伐其北鄙者矣。
tls:text.tls:line: but before he arrived another state had attacked his North borders.

sense.def: border area

seg.line: 昔人言有知不死之道者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: before; in the past year(s)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: a person, someone

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: say that one V-s

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: there are (subjects); there is 有人

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: know, be sure of; know all about

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: which causes immortality, as in 不死之藥

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔人言有知不死之道者，
tls:text.tls:line: There was once a man who said he knew the Way to become immortal.

sense.def: mass noun that can be counted and specified as being somebody's: way, or the way of doing something; ways (of the world)

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan sent a messenger to fetch the secret,

sense.def: belonging to Yan; of Yan

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan sent a messenger to fetch the secret,

sense.def: N's ruler

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan sent a messenger to fetch the secret,

sense.def: send somebody to V

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan sent a messenger to fetch the secret,

sense.def: one; somebody; someone

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan sent a messenger to fetch the secret,

sense.def: obtain (fame etc) get (something desirable that is given to one)

tls:text.tls:line: but he dawdled

sense.def: be deft and quick

tls:text.tls:line: and the man died before he arrived.

sense.def: speak up on a contextually determinate matter

tls:text.tls:line: and the man died before he arrived.

sense.def: has died

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan was very angry with the messenger

sense.def: very much, strongly; also: too much, excessively before VP: very; emphatic after VP: enormously, tremendously

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan was very angry with the messenger

sense.def: be agry at

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Yan was very angry with the messenger

sense.def: N's envoy

tls:text.tls:line: and entended to execute him.

sense.def: will V; is willing to V; have the intention to

tls:text.tls:line: and entended to execute him.

sense.def: use (something N1) on (a goal N2) 加兵於齊 HN: 不能將加誅於子

tls:text.tls:line: and entended to execute him.

sense.def: execution (by someone 吏誅 "execution by an official")

tls:text.tls:line: and entended to execute him.

sense.def: to him

tls:text.tls:line: But a favourite minister protested:

sense.def: N's favourite minister

tls:text.tls:line: But a favourite minister protested:

sense.def: remonstrate with a contextually determinate person N or on a contextually determinate subject N (and say:)

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: people generally; mankind

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: be intensely worried about, be very concerned about, be very apprehensive about

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: nothing within the range of the TOPIC; no one within the range indicated by the TOPIC

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: 爾所及 "what you reach"

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: marking end of 所－construction: particle marking the end of the nominalising construction with 所

tls:text.tls:line: 'None of a man's cares is more urgent than death,

sense.def: (V-er) in relation to/as compared to (N) 莫大乎X

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing that he values more than his life.

sense.def: him/her/them (referring to highest subject in the sentence)

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing that he values more than his life.

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing that he values more than his life.

sense.def: be more intense than N

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing that he values more than his life.

sense.def: state of being alive; life; survival; sometimes even: livelihood 治生 "look after one's livelihood"

tls:text.tls:line: That man has lost his own life,

sense.def: that one, he, those, they; these people(often used with disrespect)

tls:text.tls:line: That man has lost his own life,

sense.def: to lose; lose all control of (one's state)

tls:text.tls:line: That man has lost his own life,

sense.def: state of being alive; life; survival; sometimes even: livelihood 治生 "look after one's livelihood"

tls:text.tls:line: how could he have made you immortal?'

sense.def: how? (idiomatic in 安得 "how can one get to?", 安敢"how would I dare to?"

tls:text.tls:line: how could he have made you immortal?'

sense.def: have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to

tls:text.tls:line: how could he have made you immortal?'

sense.def: cause to, get (someone) to (do something); send (someone to do somthing)

tls:text.tls:line: how could he have made you immortal?'

sense.def: you, my ruler; your lordship; you, my master

tls:text.tls:line: how could he have made you immortal?'

sense.def: be immortal (not: not die)

tls:text.tls:line: So he did not execute him.

sense.def: therefore

tls:text.tls:line: So he did not execute him.

sense.def: execute (the contextually defined object)

tls:text.tls:line: 'Once there were three brothers

sense.def: before; in the past year(s)

tls:text.tls:line: 'Once there were three brothers

sense.def: there are (subjects); there is 有人

tls:text.tls:line: 'Once there were three brothers

sense.def: brothers in amount of NP2 people

tls:text.tls:line: 'Once there were three brothers

sense.def: measure-word for humans 生子二人

respStmt.name: dsehnal
respStmt.note: does the counting complex 三人 not modify the NP 昆弟? Should this not be rather ncpost-V{NUM}.postadN?

tls:text.tls:line: who travelled in Qi and Lu,

sense.def: be on a pleasure trip to; travel to (on business), travel (the four seas); enjoy oneself in (a place)

tls:text.tls:line: who travelled in Qi and Lu,

sense.def: within the space N1 and N2

tls:text.tls:line: studied under the same teachers,

sense.def: share (something)

tls:text.tls:line: studied under the same teachers,

sense.def: teacher; master; leading specialist

tls:text.tls:line: studied under the same teachers,

sense.def: devote oneself to study; be devoted to study; engage in intellectual work; work to improve oneself morally/intellectually

tls:text.tls:line: and came home knowing all there is to know about the principles of moral duty.

sense.def: make progress > master (a doctrine)

tls:text.tls:line: and came home knowing all there is to know about the principles of moral duty.

sense.def: additive: 1. kindliness and righteousness; 2. moral principles, morality

tls:text.tls:line: and came home knowing all there is to know about the principles of moral duty.

sense.def: the proper Way for an N

tls:text.tls:line: and came home knowing all there is to know about the principles of moral duty.

sense.def: return to where one belongs or will belong, return home; be on one's way home

tls:text.tls:line: and came home knowing all there is to know about the principles of moral duty.

sense.def: 彭蠡之川 "the river Pengli" the N2 constituted by/that is none other than N1

tls:text.tls:line: 'Their father asked them:

sense.def: N's father

tls:text.tls:line: '"What can you tell me about the principles of moral duty?'

sense.def: what is N like? what can you tell about N?

tls:text.tls:line: 'The eldest said:

sense.def: eldest brother

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me take care of my body and put it before reputation."(1)

sense.def: cause somebody contextually determinate N to V, make somebody N get into a certain situation, make somebody or something obtain a quality

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me take care of my body and put it before reputation."(1)

sense.def: me (non-contrastive)

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me take care of my body and put it before reputation."(1)

sense.def: love (oneself) 愛己

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me take care of my body and put it before reputation."(1)

sense.def: read qùshēng: treat (in practice) as being of secondary importance; humiliate through lack of respect

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me take care of my body and put it before reputation."(1)

sense.def: good name; fame; public acclaim;

tls:text.tls:line: The next said;

sense.def: second eldest brother

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me kill my body for the sake of my reputaiton."

sense.def: e.g. 以美其身 "is in order to beautify his person": be in order to, be designed to; serve the purpose of

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me kill my body for the sake of my reputaiton."

sense.def: practise successfully; to bring to completion; to bring to a successful conclusion; to accomplish; give its full form to; to make complete and perfect

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me kill my body for the sake of my reputaiton."

sense.def: good name; fame; public acclaim;

tls:text.tls:line: The youngest said:

sense.def: third eldest brother

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me preserve both body and reputation."

sense.def: all, both

tls:text.tls:line: "Moral duty makes me preserve both body and reputation."

sense.def: be perfectly present; be comprehensively developed; be in perfect shape

tls:text.tls:line: 'Those three doctrines are contradictory,

sense.def: these; those kinds of? 彼物

tls:text.tls:line: 'Those three doctrines are contradictory,

sense.def: proper technique, proper method

tls:text.tls:line: 'Those three doctrines are contradictory,

sense.def: be contradictory; be in mutual contradiction

tls:text.tls:line: yet have the same source in Confucianism.

sense.def: alike; HF 8.8.44: (inferiors cheat the ruler) in collusion, together

tls:text.tls:line: yet have the same source in Confucianism.

sense.def: arise (from something or somebody); proceed (from something or somebody); take (something) as one's point of departure

tls:text.tls:line: yet have the same source in Confucianism.

sense.def: Confucianism

tls:text.tls:line: Which is right and which is wrong.'

sense.def: which one

tls:text.tls:line: Which is right and which is wrong.'

sense.def: be correct

tls:text.tls:line: Which is right and which is wrong.'

sense.def: be mistaken, be wrong; be the wrong thing to do

sense.def: Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

tls:text.tls:line: Then Wen Ji ordered Long Shu to stand with his back to the light.

body

generalised posthumous honorific title "duke" referring to any ruler of a state enfeoffed by the Zhou, irrespective of his rank when alive. [齊公 can refer respectfully to the deceased ruler of Qi who was not a duke at all.)e.g. 周公 "Duke of Zhou" (as opposed to 桓公 "Duke Huan) Duke of Npr

sense.def: the one and only, only N

tls:text.tls:line: 不悟至妙之所会者，更麤；至高之所适者，反下；而便怪其应寂之异容，动止之殊貌，非妄惊如何？ Wang Hongzhi kindly suggested this draft translation: “把精妙的东西当成麤疏的东西，把至高的所在当成低下，看到应合静寂、停止躁动的不寻常样貌就觉得奇怪，这不就是“妄惊”嗎?” Chen Kefeng kindly suggested this draft translation: “没有领悟至上高妙，理解便粗浅；去往最高，反而得其下。于是就对他寂静的奇特面向，举止的特别而感到奇怪，不是疑惑惊慌又是什么呢？”

sense.def: why?

tls:text.tls:line: 不悟至妙之所会者，更麤；至高之所适者，反下；而便怪其应寂之异容，动止之殊貌，非妄惊如何？ Wang Hongzhi kindly suggested this draft translation: “把精妙的东西当成麤疏的东西，把至高的所在当成低下，看到应合静寂、停止躁动的不寻常样貌就觉得奇怪，这不就是“妄惊”嗎?” Chen Kefeng kindly suggested this draft translation: “没有领悟至上高妙，理解便粗浅；去往最高，反而得其下。于是就对他寂静的奇特面向，举止的特别而感到奇怪，不是疑惑惊慌又是什么呢？”

sense.def: mistakenly, wrongly; arbitrarilyBUDDH: deludedly; in a deluded way; falsely

tls:text.tls:line: 不悟至妙之所会者，更麤；至高之所适者，反下；而便怪其应寂之异容，动止之殊貌，非妄惊如何？ Wang Hongzhi kindly suggested this draft translation: “把精妙的东西当成麤疏的东西，把至高的所在当成低下，看到应合静寂、停止躁动的不寻常样貌就觉得奇怪，这不就是“妄惊”嗎?” Chen Kefeng kindly suggested this draft translation: “没有领悟至上高妙，理解便粗浅；去往最高，反而得其下。于是就对他寂静的奇特面向，举止的特别而感到奇怪，不是疑惑惊慌又是什么呢？”

sense.def: get all upset about the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: 不悟至妙之所会者，更麤；至高之所适者，反下；而便怪其应寂之异容，动止之殊貌，非妄惊如何？ Wang Hongzhi kindly suggested this draft translation: “把精妙的东西当成麤疏的东西，把至高的所在当成低下，看到应合静寂、停止躁动的不寻常样貌就觉得奇怪，这不就是“妄惊”嗎?” Chen Kefeng kindly suggested this draft translation: “没有领悟至上高妙，理解便粗浅；去往最高，反而得其下。于是就对他寂静的奇特面向，举止的特别而感到奇怪，不是疑惑惊慌又是什么呢？”
